metadata.title: CVE-2021-47177 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iommu/vt-d: Fix sysfs leak in alloc_iommu()iommu_device_sysfs_add() is called before, so is has to be cleaned onsubsequenterrors.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
